participants.name: Maulik Shah
participants.title: Amazon is Hiring Software Development Engineers and Managers in Tempe, AZ

messages.message:
Hi Brian, 

Thanks for the connection. I'm hoping you're curious about what Amazon is upto in our Phoenix office. We're located right in Mill Ave and Rio Salado and are working on some big projects. 

Would love to hear from you if you'd like to know more. 

-M
